page.title: 06Employment, Bridgham people
page.content:
From the returns to our survey, we find the following breakdown of jobs held by Bridgham residents:
Primary Occupations .... 28% (Farming & Forestry) Secondary Occupations .. 28% (Manufacturing & Processsing) Tertiary Occupations ... 44% (Service Occupations)
Compared with national averages, we show a low secondary return and a very high primary return, due to our very rural surroundings. Apart from agriculture, the Forestry Commission is an important source of village employment. Thetford (7 miles) is the nearest industrial area of any size. Those employed in tertiary occupations often have to travel great distances to places of work, over a wide area.
